resources.string: Welcome to EasyNote Audio. Below are a list of some of the key features. To create a note, go to the Note Manager and click the + symbol.
Create a note by clicking the + symbol in the bottom left
To delete a note. Hold note down.
When keyboard is present, two features are present:
Speech To Text : Click to enable speech to text and then speak and text will appear.
Click to enter bullet list mode to add a new bullet point on each new line. Click again to exit bullet list mode.
there is a play button which is TEXT TO SPEECH. Click to have the app read your notes.
On top bar, there is a check list symbol. Clicking the symbol will enter the To-Do List Screen.
Add task by pressing + symbol in bottom right.
Delete by swiping tasks and confirm deletion.
